body: gacha system ... according to japanese law, for every 100 good original works created, only 1 may be translated to english ... meanwhile, 99 out of every 100 shitty touhou, FGO & kancolle doujins *MUST* be translated ... and there are a lot more of the latter ... hence the discouraging drop rate
Yo this shit is amazing! How come only 3 of their doujins have been translated? Why are translators sleeping on this!?
